title: Ranked tier restriction placements
body:
Hi,

I ended up gold last season. My friend ended up bronze. My other friend ended up silver. Are we all able to do our placements together or is there still the restriction of my one friend being bronze and me being gold?  Thanks for your help

replies.body: You cant play. Bronze can only play with bronze and silvers. Gold can only play with gold, silver and plat.

huh? since when?
is this the new rule?
any formal Riot article about this?

> [{quoted}](name=RonyStark,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eAOVcRRj,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T04:55:48.952+0000)
>
> huh? since when?
> is this the new rule?
> any formal Riot article about this?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h4q2

> [{quoted}](name=Rocka,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eAOVcRRj,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T05:31:07.076+0000)
>
> Its always been like this.

Thanks mate. I understand it has always been like this, just was unsure if it was the same during placements?
I'm not too sure about if you're ALL in placements, but as soon as one of you gets placed I know it kicks in, and takes the others' rank from S5.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eAOVcRRj,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T05:50:50.028+0000)
>
> I'm not too sure about if you're ALL in placements, but as soon as one of you gets placed I know it kicks in, and takes the others' rank from S5.

Sweet. I'll try it out anyway. Thanks mate!
